授業方法:
[Infection Prevention Priority Period] This class will be distributed as “simultaneous two-way class via Zoom” from Session 3. Please log in to Zoom (URL: https://us06web.zoom.us/j/96762713553?pwd=eW0xV2R4QTV5VmJZN01wVUFxZDVldz09) at least 5 minutes before the start of the class. Face to face classes will continue to be conducted until Session 2

In this course, students will engage in discussion, presentation, pair work and group work tasks in an all English classroom.
